actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require information reporting with respect to airline passes provided under frequent flier or similar programs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the filing of informational returns by airlines which provide free or discount air transportation passes to customers based on a customer's patronage. Provides that such an informational return must contain the aggregate value of such passes provided in a taxable year to a customer. Requires that a statement be furnished to each customer with respect to whom information is furnished.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require information reporting with respect to airline passes provided under frequent flier or similar programs.
